meanings.definition: The variety of plant and animal life in a particular habitat or ecosystem.
meanings.sent1: The biodiversities in the rainforest include many different types of plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the biodiversities of the ocean to understand the ecosystem better.
meanings.sent3: The biodiversities at the zoo make it a fun place to visit.
meanings.sent4: The biodiversities of the savannah paint a colorful picture of nature's abundance.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the biodiversities of the desert revealed a world of unique creatures and plants.

meanings.definition: The diversity of species within a given area.
meanings.sent1: The biodiversities of the forest show how different species coexist.
meanings.sent2: Conservation efforts aim to protect the biodiversities of national parks.
meanings.sent3: The biodiversities of the garden create a harmonious balance of life.
meanings.sent4: The biodiversities of the lake form a delicate web of interconnected species.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the biodiversities of the mountain was like seeing a living mosaic of nature.

meanings.definition: The range of different forms of life in a specific environment.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the biodiversities of the coral reef revealed a vibrant underwater world.
meanings.sent2: The biodiversities of the meadow support a rich ecosystem of plants and animals.
meanings.sent3: The biodiversities of the city park provide a peaceful escape from urban life.
meanings.sent4: The biodiversities of the wetland create a symphony of life in nature.
meanings.sent5: The biodiversities of the island showcase the beauty of diverse life forms.
